name: Evil Self Platformer
description:
This Is Evil Self Platformer. 

This Is My First Ever Jam Game.

A Platformer Game Where You Have To Collect All Of Your Hearts  In A Limited Time!

You Can Then Use The Hearts  To Buy Upgrades From The Shop Or Kill Enemies  With It.

There Are 4 Types Of Enemies or Evil Self's:

1:- Deals 1HP

2:- Deals 2HP

3:-Deals 4HP

4:-Deals 8HP

If You're Health Is Less Than 0 Then The Game Restarts Over Again.

Download The Game For A Better Performance.

The Game Download Will Be Uploaded Later.

Good Luck!
